subject: Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F: Formal Invitation from the Editorial Board of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications
body:
American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications ISSN Online: 2327-249X, ISSN Print: 2327-2473 Current Issue: Vol.8, No.1, 2019 Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F, We are very impressed after reading your article titled "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We came to the assumption that American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications is in line with your research field. Our Board of Editorial Members are privileged to be inviting you to contribute your precious unpublished research articles to our journal for publication. Efficient Publication Quick Publication Service Your paper can be published online within 4-6 weeks since the date of submission. Professional Peer Review More than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world will carefully review each submitted article. Our Professional Reviewers will provide helpful suggestions to assist the authors in further improvement of their papers. Quickly Feedback The author will be provided with timely feedback about each submission, and we will provide prompt replies for every enquiries received from our authors. Guidelines for Submit your Paper 1. Instructions for manuscript preparation and Template can be seen at: http://www.ajsea.org/submission 2. Preparing your manuscript based on the manuscript template. 3. Log in and submit your paper via the submission system online. Selected Journals We have 300+ open access journals including almost all branches such as Drug Design, Animal Science, Clinical Urology, Civil, Sensors Networks, Arts, Transportation Engineering, Risk Management, International and Public Affairs, Systems Engineering, etc. For more information please check: http://www.ajsea.org/journals Engineering Science International Journal of Systems Engineering International Journal of Engineering Management American Journal of Science, Engineering and Technology American Journal of Management Science and Engineering Respectfully, Grace Kent Assistant from Editorial Office of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications


American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications
ISSN Online: 2327-249X, ISSN Print: 2327-2473
Current Issue: Vol.8, No.1, 2019
Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F,
We are very impressed after reading your article titled "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We came to the assumption that American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications is in line with your research field. Our Board of Editorial Members are privileged to be inviting you to contribute your precious unpublished research articles to our journal for publication.
Efficient Publication
Quick Publication Service
Your paper can be published online within 4-6 weeks since the date of submission.
Professional Peer Review
More than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world will carefully review each submitted article. Our Professional Reviewers will provide helpful suggestions to assist the authors in further improvement of their papers.
Quickly Feedback
The author will be provided with timely feedback about each submission, and we will provide prompt replies for every enquiries received from our authors.
Guidelines for Submit your Paper
  1. Instructions for manuscript preparation and Template can be seen at: http://www.ajsea.org/submission
  2. Preparing your manuscript based on the manuscript template.
  3. Log in and submit your paper via the submission system online.
Selected Journals
We have 300+ open access journals including almost all branches such as Drug Design, Animal Science, Clinical Urology, Civil, Sensors Networks, Arts, Transportation Engineering, Risk Management, International and Public Affairs, Systems Engineering, etc.
For more information please check: http://www.ajsea.org/journals
Engineering Science
International Journal of Systems Engineering
International Journal of Engineering Management
American Journal of Science, Engineering and Technology
American Journal of Management Science and Engineering
Respectfully,
Grace Kent
Assistant from Editorial Office of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications
